definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very

pinyin: Ke3 kou3 Ke3 le4 Gong1 si1

sentences.english: Combine four cubes and 8 oz. of Diet Coke.
sentences.chinese: 混合四个冰块和220ml健怡可乐。

sentences.english: One long swallow of the cold beverage cooled my sweating body.
sentences.chinese: 我咕噜噜长长地吞下一口冰凉的可乐。

sentences.english: And rural villagers in southern Africa harvest caterpillars from the local mopane trees.
sentences.chinese: 南非的一些农业村庄也从可乐豆木上收获毛虫。

sentences.english: The procedure of DuzhongCola was determined on the basis of results of single factor experiments.
sentences.chinese: 研究了利用杜仲叶生产杜仲可乐的工艺。

sentences.english: And a cola he quaffed named Fenhuang fizzled.
sentences.chinese: 一种他大口大口喝的可乐被称为“风花告吹”。

sentences.english: I"d like a pineapple pie and some cola."
sentences.chinese: 我要一个菠萝派和一杯可乐。

sentences.english: The coco-cola frothed as it was poured out.
sentences.chinese: 可口可乐倒出来时泛起泡沫。

sentences.english: Which would you like best, Coke or 7up?
sentences.chinese: 可乐和七喜你喜欢哪种？

sentences.english: And I thought that was Coke.
sentences.chinese: 我以为最后那条是在说可乐。

sentences.english: I had a coke in the mini - bar.
sentences.chinese: 我拿了一瓶小吧柜中的可乐。

sentences.english: Goizueta said Coke needed a larger share of that market.
sentences.chinese: 古兹维塔说，可口可乐需要在那块市场做大占有率。

sentences.english: The Coca-Cola Company is a great example of repeating past successes.
sentences.chinese: 可口可乐公司是一个重复过去成功经验的伟大榜样。

sentences.english: Coca Cola can be used to cure Jellyfish stings.
sentences.chinese: 被水母蛰伤也可以用可口可乐来治疗。

sentences.english: He let the coke gurgle down his throat.
sentences.chinese: 他咕噜咕噜地喝起了可乐。

sentences.english: To share credit information of credit customer with bottler.
sentences.chinese: 与太古可口可乐各个装瓶厂分享信用客户信用信息。

sentences.english: Order a coke with a meal only if determined to upset the waiter.
sentences.chinese: 除非你想令侍应生不快，否则点餐时别配以可乐。

definition: Xianchengduo, Chinese brand of orange-flavored soft drink
orange juice/CL:瓶[ping2],杯[bei1],罐[guan4],盒[he2]/see also 橙汁[cheng2 zhi1]
